full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

### Rental of Two-Way Radios and Related Technical Support Services

#### Reference Number:
cb-5153-5031188

#### Solicitation Number:
10221735 Amendment001/Modification001

#### Publication Date:
2023-05-03

#### Tender Closing Date:
2023-06-07, 14:00:00

#### Expected Contract Start Date:
2023-07-31

#### Expected Contract End Date:
2025-04-30

#### Tender Status:
Expired

### Description

Canada is seeking a supplier for the rental of two-way radio equipment and related technical support services for special events in the National Capital Region on an “as and when” required basis. The intended contracting outcome is the issuance of a Standing Offer for an initial period of two years, with two additional one-year option periods. The proposed contract value is not specified.

### Mandatory Criteria

The proposed two-way radio network must meet the following technical requirements:

*   Digital (UHF) frequency communication
*   Dedicated frequencies exclusively available to Canada Heritage users
*   Accommodate a minimum of 10 channels simultaneously
*   Permit each channel to operate independently and facilitate communication between channels
*   Be programmable to allow different channels on different portable radios or mobile base station units
*   Accommodate between 6 and 250 portable radios

The supplier must also demonstrate the network’s coverage of the National Capital Region by providing a detailed map of the minimum coverage area.

### Evaluation Criteria

The supplier must attest to and demonstrate the capability to provide technical support services 24 hours a day and 7 days a week for all equipment, accessories, and network covered by the resulting Standing Offer. This includes both program critical and non-emergency services and equipment replacements.

### Attachment

The tender notice and relevant documentation can be accessed on the Canadian Government’s tendering platform [canadabuys.canada.ca](http://canadabuys.canada.ca). The following documents are available for download:

*   10221735_rfso_amendment001.pdf
*   10221735_rfso.pdf
*   10221735_doc.pdf
*   10221735_doc_modification001.pdf

### Contact Information

For any inquiries or information, please contact:

*   Gregory
*   contrats-contracting@pch.gc.ca
*   (613) 323-4765
